titleStmt.title: Corona Minervæ. Or A masque presented before Prince Charles His Highnesse, the Duke of Yorke his brother, and the Lady Mary his sister, the 27th of February, at the Colledge of the Museum Minervæ.
titleStmt.author: Kinnaston, Francis, Sir, 1587-1642.

notesStmt.note: Variant: with an added leaf, "To the reader", inserted after title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
